description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 274a, line 15. Physical description: 16 lines per page; written in neat naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords; marginal notes. Edges moldered. Origin: Qism 1 completed Jumādá I 1224 H [June-July 1809]; this copy made from the draft and completed Rabīʻ I 1230 H [February-March 1815] (leaf 274b). Incipit: الحمد لله الذي اوردنا مناهل ربوبيته ... اما بعد فاني بعد ما فرغت من تصنىف القسم الاول من کتابي ... المسمى بمقاصد
author: Ārānī, Muḥammad ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad Ḥasan, active 19th century
abstract: The author's abridgement of his al-Maqāṣid al-muhimmah fī uṣūl al-fiqh; part 1 contains Mabāḥith al-alfāẓ.
extent: 274 leaves : paper ; 212 x 149 (123 x 63) mm bound to 215 x 152 mm

title.@value: القسم الاول من قسمي مناهل الشوارد في تلخيص المقاصد.
al-Qism al-awwal min qismay Manāhil al-shawārid fī talkhīṣ al-Maqāṣid.

uniform_title: Manāhil al-shawārid fī talkhīṣ al-Maqāṣid. Qism 1
مناهل الشوارد في تلخيص المقاصد. قسم 1
provenance: On leaf 1a, note dated 1326 H [1908 or 1909] by Baḥr al-ʻUlūm.
creator: Ārānī, Muḥammad ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad Ḥasan, active 19th century
آراني، محمد علي بن محمد حسن، active 19th century
